document_data.name: Heldebran
document_data.mainbody: '''Heldebran''' was a [[human]] [[wizard]] of [[Athalantar]] and the last surviving apprentice of the [[magelord]]s after [[Elminster Aumar]]'s insurrection.
document_data.History: The wizard followed Elminster into [[Cormanthyr]] seeking revenge but was killed by [[elf|elves]] in [[241 DR]].
